name: Ambica Machine Tools
overview:
stablished in the year 2006, we, “Ambica Machine Tools”, are an ISO 9001 : 2008

Our Products: Hydrostatic Test Pump Electric Motor Operated Hydrostatic Test Pump Water Pressure Testing Pump Engine Operated Hydrostatic Test Pump High Pressure Hydro Testing Pump Hydro Test Pump Hand Operated Hydro Test Pump High Pressure Hydro Test Pump

Our Team: A diligent team of professionals is employed by us, which greatly supports us in all the activities of trade. The dedicated, sincere and hardworking professionals working with us are masters of their respective fields of specialization.

Infrastructure: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at our premises for streamlined execution of the business process. Spread over a vast area, this facility is instigated with advanced technology and high tech machines that enable us to reduce the production time and make our range cost-effective.

Our Strengths: We have carved a remarkable position in the industry due to our superior quality products. Our ethical business policies and transparent dealings have enabled us to prove our mettle in the industry.

Quality Assurance: Since commencement, the main aim of our organization is to provide our clients with a quality-approved range of products. The range offered by us is manufactured using excellent quality material and components that are sourced from, vendors of high repute after scouring the market.
